alert.note: Alert for Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties; Northern Washoe County; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 6:16PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with heavy rain continue across the Western Nevada Basin and Range, including Mineral, Southern Lyon, Churchill, and Pershing counties, including far eastern Washoe County through 730 PM PDT... At 613 PM PDT, meteorologists continue to track showers and thunderstorms with heavy rainfall across west-central Nevada. These showers and thunderstorms will affect areas mainly east of the Sweetwater, Pine Nut, and Virginia Mountain ranges into the Basin and Range of west-central Nevada. These showers and thunderstorms are moving north at 20 to 30 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rainfall with rates up to 1 inch per hour, gusty winds to 40 mph, and lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Localized flooding of low spots and poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Fallon, Lovelock, Pyramid Lake, Lahontan Reservoir, Fernley, Hawthorne, Yerington, Middlegate, Wellington, Silver Springs, Smith, Trinity Junction, Mason, Mina, Wabuska, Unionville, Fort Churchill Station, Weed Heights, Luning, and Oreana. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall is occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Remember to slow down and turn on your headlights in heavy rain.
